name: Big Pack for OpenToonz
description:
Hello. This is the starting assembly of the pack. In the process, the pack will build up with a large number of additions.

You can speed up and improve the process of expanding the pack with your donations. 

Now the package has: 

1. Transitions 
2. Elements 

  • Simple 
  • Detail  
  • Decor 
  • Comics
  • Infographic 

3. Background 
Also you can follow the news - Click here (Feedback)
